intro: Welcome to the CognitiveBots platform. We've identified a wide range of professional job roles that can be extended as cognitive bots. This innovation allows individuals to have multiple instances and serve various accounts, projects, and organizations effectively, optimizing their productivity and offering tremendous benefits to both individuals and organizations.

bots.intro: Welcome to the CognitiveBots platform. We've identified a wide range of professional job roles that can be extended as cognitive bots. This innovation allows individuals to have multiple instances and serve various accounts, projects, and organizations effectively, optimizing their productivity and offering tremendous benefits to both individuals and organizations.
bots.description:
Menu Options:
 '101' to get an intro of Jason.
 '102' to learn and understand what Storage Architects do.
 '103' to view anyupcoming or past trainings conducted.
 '104' to deploy Jason at your Organization.

Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.

bots.intro: Hello, Mr.Sridhar P Naidu! by experience is a seasoned Enterprise Architect but in his current role he is designated as The Client Transformation Leader heading the Site Reliability Engineering team For European Accounts. If you are interested in reducing your enetrprise operational expenses? then you are at the right place, see below to learn how to get started!!
bots.description:
You can get started by typing,
 1. '201' to get an intro of SRE's.
 2. 'aaas' to understand the offering Austomation as a Service.
 3. 'join event' to join any upcoming event/meeting.
 4. 'incident report' to bring up the daily incident chart, and then type 'start sod' to start the SoD.
 5. 'canvas' to get into creative programming, type 'canvas' again to get back to workbench view.

Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.

bots.intro: Hello, it is my pleasure to indroduce you to Mr.Erphan Desai. See my ways of working below:

bots.intro: Hello, Introducing our new Partner, Mr.Emmanuel Ebo Budu-Mensah, the President of Perfect Care Institute of Fire & Safety Engineering. Welcome Aboard!!

Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.

bots.intro: Hello there! Thanks for dropping by. Isn't it a beautiful day?. You can get started by typing the options in the below menu:
bots.description:

 '002' to understand the offering Automation as a Service.
 '003' to join any upcoming event/meeting.
 '004' to learn about the Cognitive AI Workbench.

Click on Button:'Next' to see other roles. Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.

bots.intro: Hi, this is Alice, an Senior Project Manager with 15 years of exexpreience in managing projects for AeroSpace and Defense, Banking and Insurance, and various internal IT programs. You can check her expertise by typing the menu options below! Chao!!
